name: PhasQuaz
description:
The day has finally arrived... For you to become a professional Ghost Hunter! 

We've dropped you in an undisclosed forest completely against your will to take the 30 Question Final Assessment!
Nearby is a Sign dipped in... "Paranormal Fluids". Use this sign to answer the questions and you'll be all good to begin hunting for ghosts!
P.S. We released a ghost near your location, better keep those smudge sticks close!

Best Regards,
The Ghost Academy <3

=====================

  • 30 Phasmophobia based questions
  • Full Story
  • 2 Normal Endings
  • 1 Secret Ending?
  • Lots and Lots of Easter Eggs!

=====================

Dev Comment:
Hello! Thank you for taking the time to look at this page, this is my first real released game and my personal love letter to Phasmo and Insym. (Insym if your reading this I love you <3)
Anyways, like I said this is my very first game, and I am still learning how to make games, so please, if you have any feedback or find any bugs, COMMENT THEM! Thank you.
-K7 PhasQuaz has no affiliation with Kinetic Games. It is a fan-creation made by K7.
